item.title: Panel Data: Advanced Concepts
item.description:
This note explores advanced topics in panel data econometrics, especially when applying causal inference logic.

Key Topics Covered:

  • 💼 Two-way Fixed Effects (TWFE): When both entity and time effects are important
  • ⚖️ Assumptions of DiD in Staggered Treatment: Parallel trends, heterogeneous treatment
  • 🔄 Event Study Designs: Pre-trend testing and dynamic treatment effects
  • 🧪 Instrumental Variables in Panel Setting: Controlling for endogeneity across time

Based on: Wooldridge (2010),
